TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HtmlTextWriterAttribute extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the HTML attributes that an or object writes to the opening tag of an HTML element when a Web request is processed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is commonly used with the following methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.GetAttributeName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.IsAttributeDefined%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
## Examples The following example uses the HtmlTextWriterAttribute enumeration with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.AddAttribute%2A> method to add an `Onclick` attribute to an HTML element and sets its value to ECMAScript code.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.htmltext_0_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.htmltext_0_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.ui.htmltext_0_1.cpp)]
